trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Annine is beside herself with worry for her missing brothers.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_TODO_00<tab>Search for the stocky miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_TODO_01<tab>Search for the stout miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_TODO_02<tab>Report to the stocky miner.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_ANNINE_000_000<tab>Could I ask a favor?
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_ANNINE_000_001<tab>My two brothers set out for Mount Biran Mines to see if there's anything worth salvaging, but they've been gone an awfully long time.

TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_ANNINE_000_002<tab>Would you be able to go and look for them? I'd go myself, but I hear the place is crawling with all sorts of nasty creatures, and fighting's not my forte. I don't expect you to do it for free, of course.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_ANNINE_000_010<tab>One of them is a bit of a big lad, and the other is also quite big, but slightly less so. I'm sure you'll know them when you see them.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_020<tab>Eh? Who are you?
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_021<tab>She was bloody right when she said it was dangerous here.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_022<tab>We ran into a pack of coyotes, and we were separated when we tried to outrun them.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_023<tab>I got away but I don't know what's happened to my brother.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_024<tab>Hopefully, he found somewhere to hide. Will you help me look for him?
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_030<tab>I'll join you in the search once I've caught my breath. I don't think I've ever run so fast in my life!
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERB03499_000_040<tab>Annine sent you to find us? Thanks, stranger. I'd better go and see if my brother is all right.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERB03499_000_050<tab>I was afraid we'd never get out of here alive!
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_060<tab>I never thought I'd be so happy to see him!
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERB03499_000_061<tab>Now that we've got reinforcements, we should be able to carry on where we left off. It'll be a lot easier with someone to cover our backs.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_062<tab>Hold on now, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> didn't come here for that.
TEXT_LUCKZG014_03499_BROTHERA03499_000_063<tab>Before we get ahead of ourselves, let me give you this. It's the least we can offer you for coming to our rescue.
